name: Neon Tentacle
description: A pulsating mass of bioluminescent tissue trails along the floor, its tentacles twitching and coiling in anticipation. The neon light it emits shimmers with an unnatural intensity, casting eerie shadows across the walls. Its central body is a bulbous sack that seems to expand and contract rhythmically.

flavor.rationale: The Neon Tentacle thrives in the humid, dark environments of the city sewers. It feeds on bio-waste and technological detritus, absorbing stray electrical currents to fuel its bioluminescence. Its tentacles are used to ensnare prey or manipulate objects from a distance.
